mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Casto, Martin Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of the middle thind thigh anteriorly Ball extracted on the field. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/24. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
